name: Lollipocalypse
description:
I whipped up a game in Pico-8 in 48 hours for a game design class and felt like other people might get a kick out of it!

Avoid the lollipops for as long as you can, the density of pops increases over time so see how high you can get your score to go!

Controls:

  • Left: Rotates your ship to the left
  • Right: Rotates your ship to the right

Lollipop by River (and a BUNCH of unused sprites)
